preBuildHooks.windows/*: powershell -Command "$root = (git rev-parse --show-toplevel); New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force \"$root\\wails-ui\\workset\\build\\sessiond\" | Out-Null; go build -o \"$root\\wails-ui\\workset\\build\\sessiond\\workset-sessiond.exe\" \"$root\\cmd\\workset-sessiond\""

postBuildHooks.darwin/*: sh -c "ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel); BIN='${bin}'; if [ -n \"$BIN\" ] && [ \"$BIN\" != '\${bin}' ]; then DEST=\"$BIN.app/Contents/Resources/workset-sessiond\"; else DEST=\"$ROOT/wails-ui/workset/build/bin/workset.app/Contents/Resources/workset-sessiond\"; fi; cp \"$ROOT/wails-ui/workset/build/sessiond/workset-sessiond\" \"$DEST\""
postBuildHooks.linux/*: sh -c "ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel); BIN='${bin}'; if [ -n \"$BIN\" ] && [ \"$BIN\" != '\${bin}' ]; then DEST=\"$BIN\"; else DEST=\"$ROOT/wails-ui/workset/build/bin/workset\"; fi; cp \"$ROOT/wails-ui/workset/build/sessiond/workset-sessiond\" \"$DEST\""
